sentences.en: A performer in evening dress plays classical selections on the violin.
sentences.cn: 一名身穿晚礼服的表演者用小提琴演奏了几段古典音乐。

sentences.en: A pipe organ gives much more volume than a violin or flute.
sentences.cn: 管风琴发出的音量比小提琴或笛子都大.

sentences.en: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

sentences.en: Einstein enjoyed himself playing his violin in his simple home.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦在他那简朴的家里拉小提琴消遣.

sentences.en: He keyed up all the strings of his violin before his performance.
sentences.cn: 他在表演前将小提琴所有的弦都调好了。

sentences.en: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.cn: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴.

sentences.en: If you increase the tension of that violin string it will break.
sentences.cn: 如果你再拉紧小提琴的那根弦,它就会绷断.

sentences.en: She can string a violin.
sentences.cn: 她会给小提琴上弦.

sentences.en: She has toiled away at the violin for years.
sentences.cn: 她多年来苦练小提琴。

sentences.en: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.cn: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.en: She plays the violin, I mean the viola, really well.
sentences.cn: 她的小提琴, 我是指中提琴, 的确拉得很好.

sentences.en: She rippled a lively rhythm on the violin.
sentences.cn: 她在小提琴上奏出明快的节奏。

sentences.en: She was a child prodigy on the violin.
sentences.cn: 她是神童小提琴手.

sentences.en: The cello is a member of the violin family.
sentences.cn: 大提琴是提琴家族的一员.

sentences.en: The music of the violin blended sweetly with her voice.
sentences.cn: 小提琴的乐曲和她的嗓音很和谐。

sentences.en: The soloist in the violin concerto was Menuhin.
sentences.cn: 这首小提琴协奏曲的独奏者是梅纽因.

sentences.en: The sound is from the waist of a violin.
sentences.cn: 声音是从小提琴的中间部分发出的.

sentences.en: The violin and the piano seem to be out of tune.
sentences.cn: 钢琴和小提琴好像不合调.

sentences.en: The violin was out of harmony with the rest of the instruments.
sentences.cn: 小提琴拉得与其他乐器不谐调.

sentences.en: The young boy played the violin sonata masterfully.
sentences.cn: 那个小男孩的小提琴奏鸣曲拉得很熟练.

words.tran_cn: 小提琴演奏者，小提琴家

phrases.tran_cn: 小提琴协奏曲；小提琴协奏曲选

trans.tran_en: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings
